author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Have Alfie, Jade, Marnie and Tabby left Hollyoaks for good? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 7:25 pm (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
Hollyoaks appeared to air a series of emotional exits in tonight’s episodes as Linda Gray’s character Tabby took Alfie Nightingale back to Hollywood with her – after he said a final farewell to his lost love Jade Albright. 
But has he left the village for good with his gran – or will we see Richard Linnell back? Fans of Alfie should fear not – the character is just taking a break and he will return next month. But we have now seen the last of Kassius Nelson in her role as tragic Jade. (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
With Tabby having helped Alfie to finally let go, he paid an emotional and final goodbye to Jade before climbing into Tabby’s limo to head off for a great adventure. 
Meanwhile, Marnie Nightingale faced a dramatic day too as her vengeful actions almost led to the death of Mac. Marnie set fire to the restaurant, unaware that Mac was sleeping inside but as Marnie insisted that he and Lisa Loveday had been having an affair and that they were involved in Nathan’s death, no-one seemed to believe her and she was taken away for treatment. (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
Marnie will be back though – and she has vowed revenge on Mac that viewers just know will have far reaching consequences for all concerned . 
So with Alfie and Marnie only off screen for a while and Hollyoaks an Linda both open to future returns for Tabby, the heavy set of Nightingale goodbyes tonight aren’t quite as bad as they seem. (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
Which is great – as we have recently been gushing about just how brilliant the family are at the moment. 
And you can guarantee even more big drama to come in the very near future. 
Hollyoaks continues on Tuesday 28th February at 7pm on E4. You can see tonight’s scenes again beforehand on Channel 4 at 6:30pm.
